Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/56th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 59th, Kedzie, 55th, and California due to, street blockage near California/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 59th, Kedzie, 55th, and California due to, street blockage near California/56th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
